name: Hallowed Encounter
description: Trick-or-Treat! Or so you thought? Halloween night, last year, Weston Norris lost his daughter. This year, he plans on avoiding the night as the Trick or Treaters come knocking. But, once you sit alone in the screamingly silent darkness on Halloween night, youâ€™ll truly learn what goes bump in the night.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (32-bit or 64-bit) Processor: Intel Dual-Core min 2GHz (Core 2 Duo and above) or AMD Dual-Core min 2GHz (Phenom II X2 and above) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 series or AMD Radeon HD 5750 series or higher (minimum 1 GB dedicated VRAM GDDR5) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or higher, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or higher (minimum 2 GB dedicated VRAM GDDR5) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
